column4: heyas. If I have more than soundcard installed in my box, how can I set which card generally gets sound played out of it?
best to just disable the one you don't want
yeah. I want my on-board one to be the one sound comes out of. I also have a tuner card, which has an in-built sound card, which KDE is trying to use to play sound
in the volume mixer program, it says: Realtek ALC655 rev 0 (OSS mixer), and SiS SI7012 (ALSA mixer)
you need to find out which one your tv tuner is using
I believe the SiS is the tuner card
what does "lsmod | grep sis" print then?
oic, :P I just saw the red, and got antsy
